name: Etekcity 22lb/10kg Digital Kitchen Food Scale Pro, Ultra Thin and High Accuracy, Volume measurement Supported
categoryPath: Home/Kitchen & Dining/Cookware, Bakeware & Tools/Kitchen Tools & Gadgets

reviews.name: Etekcity 22lb/10kg Digital Kitchen Food Scale Pro, Ultra Thin and High Accuracy, Volume measurement Supported
reviews.reviewText: This scale is awesome! Wasn't expecting much for the price but I was wrong! It's accurate and can handle large or very small portions. I'm very pleased with it. Love the tare feature!
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise!

reviews.name: Etekcity 22lb/10kg Digital Kitchen Food Scale Pro, Ultra Thin and High Accuracy, Volume measurement Supported
reviews.reviewText: this product was a great investment at a great price!!!
reviews.title: Great scale for the price

reviews.name: Etekcity 22lb/10kg Digital Kitchen Food Scale Pro, Ultra Thin and High Accuracy, Volume measurement Supported
reviews.reviewText:
It is useful to control the amount of food. Help me to calculate the calorie. If you are on diet, it helps a lot.
It is very accurate.
BTW it's very easy to clean. The surface is like glass.
reviews.title: THIS ITEM IS AWESONE!!! PERFORMS MUCH BETTER THAN
